title: UC football coach Tommy Tuberville, players after UConn win
text:
UC football coach Tommy Tuberville, players after UConn win 
Updated: Sun, Oct 25 2015, 07:34 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- University of Cincinnati football coach Tommy Tuberville discusses Saturday's 37-13 win over UConn. Related Stories
